title: Escape with a Scoundrel
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00CH67UWQIf you love protective alpha male heroes, edge-of-your-seat adventure, and scorching love scenes, discover why readers are raving about Shelly Thacker's Escape with a Scoundrel series!When she awoke this morning, she certainly never expected to end the day in bed with a man...Samantha Delafield is an aristocratic lady turned devious thief. Nicholas Brogan is an ex-pirate with years of sin branded on his soul. Captured by His Majesty's marshals, the two are on their way to the gallows until they stage a daring escape and run for their lives--shackled together by an iron chain that quickly proves unbreakable. Lost in a remote forest in Staffordshire, the pair of outlaws are forced to work together to survive and quickly find themselves locked in a battle of fierce wills...and fiery passions.Originally published under the title RUN WILD. New look, same great book!
author: Shelly Thacker
